subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chelsea, unstoppable in its first five matches as defending champion, failed its first major test of the English Premier League season Saturday as Carlos Tévez’s goal gave host Manchester City a 1-0 win at Eastlands.
snippet: Chelsea, unstoppable in its first five matches as defending champion, failed its first major test of the English Premier League season Saturday as Carlos Tévez’s goal gave host Manchester City a 1-0 win at Eastlands.
